Quadruple Baked Mac

Favorite this recipe
Serving Size: 20oz Calories: 450
Prep time: 20min. Cook time: 1hr.
Carbs 4gFat 12gSugar 1gProtein 20gFiber 1gTHC 10mg

Grocery List:

Ingredients:

  • Chicken Breast + 3 Large
  • Broth of Beast + 1 Cup

Seasoning:

  • Paprika + 2 Tbsp.
  • Pink Sea Salt + 1/2 Tbsp.
  • Garlic Powder + 2 Tsp.
  • Turmeric + 1 Tbsp.
  • Cayenne Powder + 1 tsp.
  • Onion Powder + 3 Tsp.
  • Cracked Black Pepper + 2 Tbsp.
  • Chicken Stock + 1/2 Tbsp.
  • Beef Boulion + 1 Cube

Instructions:

  1. Preheat oven to the 666°
  2. Knead dough with your bare-fuckin' hands
